org.vanilladb.core.storage.tx.concurrency

Class ConcurrencyMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.storage.tx.concurrency.ConcurrencyMgr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionLifecycleListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadCommittedConcurrencyMgr, RepeatableReadConcurrencyMgr, SerializableConcurrencyMgr

    public abstract class ConcurrencyMgr
extends Object
implements TransactionLifecycleListener
    A locking-based concurrency manager that controls when a Transaction instance should be stalled to allow concurrency execution of multiple transactions. Each transaction will have its own concurrency manager. This class is intended to be extended to provide different isolation levels.
